dct_title_s: Reconnaissance geologic map and cross sections of central Costa Rica. Mapa de reconocimiento geologico y cortes transversales de Costa Rica central
dct_description_sm: Includes inset map, 2 col. cross-sections, and text. Inset map: Index map showing the location of major geographic features: the Istarú, Barba, Abra, Caraigres, Tapantí, Tucurrique, and Carillo quadrangles; and the Quaternary volcanoes of Costa Rica.
